row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Package file" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive type" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_TYPE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_TYPE#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@WINDOWS
$ISDIRTARGET = $ISDIR
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@WINDOWS
$ISFILESOURCE = $ISFILE
$errors = 0
if ($ISDIRTARGET -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "The extract location '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET#' doesn't exist or not directory." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR $errors = 1 }
if ($ISFILESOURCE -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Package file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "The package '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME#' doesn't exist or not file." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR $errors = 2 }
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 __uc_return( 100 ) :ENDIF
if ( $errors -gt 0 ) { __uc_return( $errors ) }
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME#,'`','``') :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET#,'`','``')
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#file-system-tool.jar" file Unpack "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_NAME#" "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_UNPACK_TARGET#" "&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_TYPE#"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
